data.name: Christine
data.detailed_description:
Also recommended for you

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1813190/Little_Inner_Monsters__Card_Game/?utm_source=steampage&utm_campaign=chrs_page

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1233540/How_Buddys_parents_met__a_jigsaw_puzzle_tale/?utm_source=steampage&utm_campaign=chrs_page

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1446280/Alice_in_Wonderland__a_jigsaw_puzzle_tale/?utm_source=steampage&utm_campaign=chrs_page


About the Game

Christine is a young orphan who works at the Paris Opera, with an untapped talent for singing. She loves to sing and dreams of being a soprano at the Opera, but she never thought it would be possible.

When she sees that there will be a selection for the lead singer of a majestic opera based on the book Phantom of the Opera by Gaston Leroux, a light goes on.

Our Christine's life has several coincidences with the Christine in that story: an orphan living and working hard at the Paris Opera. She loves music, a passion inherited from her late father, but she didn't have the opportunity to explore that talent and passion.

How will she reconcile her daily tasks with her evolution? Who can she count on: her friends, an Angel of Music, or herself?
Is it worth facing her fears to pursue her goal?

In this interactive story with a unique musical score, follow the defining year in Christine's quest to pursue her dreams.

FOLLOW CHRISTINE'S DEVELOPMENT!



Add “Christine” to your wishlist and follow the game to keep up with the development.


The game will feature art from Katia Numakura (@katia.numakura) and music from Tatyana Jacques (@taty_jacques).

To know about our other games, follow Mens Sana Interactive Steam page:
https://store.steampowered.com/developer/menssana

data.short_description: Christine is a young orphan who works at the Paris Opera, with an unexplored talent for singing. If history sometimes repeats itself, will an Angel of Music help her to achieve her dreams?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.3 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 10
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS Catalina 10.15.+
  • Processor: 2.3 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
